name: Twisted 10 (Demo)
description:
(PLAY STORY MODE FIRST)

(Fullscreen Highly Recommended, click the blue arrow, not the transparent one)

10 girls are born, all of them abandoned by their parents at a young age. So they all became candidates for an experiment by an agency.  An experiment on how powerful a human can become. They got injected with a syringe that would give them powers.  It ended up being a success, but it was a terrible mistake because 8 of the 10 girls used their powers for evil purposes.  Only 2 of the girls used their powers for good purposes, so they got hired to become assassins for the agency that started it all to kill the remaining girls.

So far only the first 3 missions are complete. Please tell me any thing I should fix in the comments
